texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Ah, good morning!

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Morning. You're up early.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Yeah, kind of felt like being the early bird for once.
I nod at her.
Azuki's still sleeping on the sofa.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Besides! We're gonna have a shoot, so I had to doll myself up for the occasion.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: You didn't need to do anything special.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: But it's our last time, so I wanna look good!

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Mhm.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: That photographer guy said you have potential, remember? So you'd better get a shot of Halley's Comet tonight.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Yeah, it's just that...

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Mm?

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: He told me to take pictures of the people looking up at the comet, not the comet itself.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: People?
I nod in response.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: He saw my photos and said I'm more cut out for taking pictures of people. Like him.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Mhm! I agree! I think your photographs helped me love myself better, even!

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: I think you're the person I can capture best too.
Sumomo smiles at me happily.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: My new teacher told me to take pictures of people looking up at the comet today.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: I think that's good, yeah!

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: But I think my best photographs will still be the ones I take of you, so I want to show him some more of those too.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: That is, if you're okay with it.
Sumomo nods enthusiastically.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Oh, please do!
I nod back at her.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: I see. So the photographs you showed him were of me?

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Yeah, they were.
I nod noncommittally.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Really?! My photographs kickstarted your career?! I'm so happy! So, what else did he say?!

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Err, not much.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Didn't he say I was cute or something?!

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: I don't think I remember.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: What the heck?!

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: He said you were my best subject.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Ooh! What else?!

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Just that.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Hmph!
I don't mention that he pointed out how much I adore her.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Where should we go?
Sumomo tilts her head in confusion.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Mm?

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: For the shoot. It's best if it's a place you like, so you should pick.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Pick the place, huh? Let's see...
Sumomo looks up as she thinks it over.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Maybe somewhere... where we can see the whole city.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: I really want to remember this summer and this city.
She speaks with a smile.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Hmm, let me think.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Is there a place like that around?

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Nothing's coming to mind right away, but I'm sure we can find one.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Ahahah! More location scouting, huh?
Sumomo seems thrilled by the idea.
Her enthusiasm is infectious.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: I love the idea! Let's search together! I bet we can find something good before lunch.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Yeah.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: You told your daddy to make some time tonight?

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Yeah, I did.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Great. We gotta be back by tonight, then.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: If you're all ready, we could head out now.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Sure thing!
I'm so glad it's a sunny day.
The air is clear and fresh.
The locals aren't up and about yet, so we walk side by side through the empty streets.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Ah, Kanna! Look at that.
Sumomo stops and points to a narrow alley.
Just past the houses lies a dirt road, almost an animal trail, leading up a small mountain beyond.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Think it's safe?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: You've never been there?

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: No... I don't think people live in this area anymore.
This was my usual road from home to the academy, but I stuck to it pretty rigidly.
As we approach, we notice the trail has little steps made out of small logs and flattened soil.
A man-made trail, then.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: There's stairs, even.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Wanna go?
Sumomo nods, her eyes shining.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: This is an adventure! Let's go!
We climb up the crudely assembled stairs of the path.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Whoa! This is super!
At the end of the dimly lit trail, we come out to a quiet meadow.
It looks out over all of Nariyama city.
I've never been here before.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: I didn't think I'd warm up to this place so much. I used to think it was such a backwater.
She smiles at me as she speaks.
I turn on my camera and hold it up.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Ah, you're starting already?

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Yeah, just try to be natural.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Agreed.
Sumomo turns her back to me and looks down at the cityscape.
I gaze at her through the viewfinder and press the shutter.
She looks back with a smile.
I frame her profile and press the shutter again.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Say, Kanna...
Sumomo walks at a slow pace, her hands clasped behind her.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: I'm sure you'll be able to make lots of people happy in the future.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Your shoots are so much fun.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: I bet the models'll be all over you too.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: I don't care about that.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Ahahah! Now that I think about it, getting to talk with you now, while you're still pure and innocent, might be something really special.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: You can also...

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Hm?

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: You can make lots of people smile too. You have that kind of power.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Your smile can make people happy...

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: ...just as well as my photography.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: You think so?

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Yeah. Sometimes I take a look at that photo of you to cheer myself up.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Only sometimes?!

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: ...Actually, it's every single day.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Really?!
I nod.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Oh, you cheeky little thing! You head over heels for me or something?

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: ...I am.
My response obviously takes her by surprise. She stares right at the camera, eyes wide.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: I realized I'm in love with you.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Can you say it one more time?
I lower the camera and look directly at her.
She returns my gaze.
There's a faint blush in her cheeks.
I can tell that my face is red and hot as well.
I go back to looking at her through the viewfinder.
Yeah, I still can't say it straight to her face...

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: I think you know what I said.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Ahahah!
A smile of pure joy spreads across her face.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Sounds like we feel the same way about each other.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: It seems so.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Am I your first love?

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Maybe.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Yippee!

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: So I'm your first, huh? I'm so glad I did this teacher training thing.
Sumomo turns her gaze to the town.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: I'll get better at photography.
She turns around to face me again.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Yes! I know you will!

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: I'll be able to teach you even more about it.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Yes!

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: So...
She waits for me to continue.
The wind blows, stirring her hair.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Come back and visit me sometime.
Sumomo nods.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: I'll come anytime, if you'll be there waiting for me.
The tears welling up in my eyes make it difficult to get the image in focus.
I want to get a picture of that gentle smile.
I know this is no time to be crying.
And yet the tears don't stop.
I wipe the tears away with my hand.
Sumomo just watches, her smile unwavering.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Sorry.
She shakes her head slowly.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: It's okay.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Mhm.
I take a deep breath and look through the viewfinder again.
Now that I've got her in focus, I can see she has tears in her eyes too.
But she's still smiling.
Both her smile and her tears are so undeniably Sumomo. I press the shutter again.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: You got my good side?

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: That's every side.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: That was smooth, heheh.
She giggles at my comment.
After coming down back down from the hill, we have lunch together.
We start looking through the photos on my camera's display, reminiscing about the summer. It feels like we've only just begun when I notice that the sun is setting.
Where did all the time go?
We leave the fast food restaurant where we spent way too much time, and head back to the city.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: You've got your homework from your teacher, right? To take pictures of people looking at Halley's Comet?

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Yeah. I was thinking about heading to the academy. I hear they opened the roof for comet-watching.
There were posters about it in the library.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: The academy, huh? I guess it'd be awkward for me to tag along, since I'm no longer part of the faculty.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: If you have the time, we can go together. It's open to the public, so it's probably okay.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Do you wanna go together?
After a long silence, I nod.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Ahahah! You've gotten a lot more upfront about what you want.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Then I'll come with. I wanna be with you.
There's already a crowd at the academy's entrance.
The entrance is wide open, and people are pouring in en masse.
There are all kinds of people, from really little kids to adults old enough to be parents of students.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Whoa, that's a lot of people.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: This only comes around once every 76 years, I guess.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Guess this is our comet party, huh?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Yes! This is great!
As we enter, we find the undergraduates who sponsored the get-together guiding visitors to the elevators.
Sumomo and I follow the crowds to the rooftop.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Whoa, this place is packed!

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: This only happens once every 76 years, so no wonder.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: You're gonna take pics of lots of different people, right? Wanna split off?

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Huh? But...

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: This is an important job for you. Go take lots of nice photos. It's the first step towards your dream!

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: I'll be watching you kill it from the sidelines!

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Okay. I'll do it.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Go for it!
Kanna walks off, fiddling with the huge camera hanging from a strap around his neck.
I wonder if a big camera like that is hard to use.
Something about him seems stronger than before, more reliable.
Or maybe that's just my imagination.
I watch him strike up a conversation with a family comet-gazing together.
I wonder if he's asking for permission to take photos of them.
Yes, good. He'd never take pictures of someone without their consent. That's my boy.
He raises his camera and snaps a shot of the smiling family.
After taking a few more, he bows and thanks them.
Yes, good. It's nice to thank people properly. That's my boy.
He glances my way and waves.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Ahahah.
The little gesture is so sweet that it makes me laugh.
I return the wave, and then he turns away with a smile and moves on to the next person.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Heh... I shouldn't get in his way.
Step by step, he's getting closer to his dream.
He argued with his dad, then made up.
He found a rival and got jealous over their success, and lost his way a few times.
But I can feel he's slowly growing up into the person he wants to be.
But what about me? What should I do?
If I just while the years away...
He may be disappointed with me when we manage to meet again.
I let out a small sigh.
And that sigh...
Is matched by one from the girl sitting next to me.
When I turn to her, she looks right back at me.

texts.name: Student
texts.text: Oh?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Hm?
Her eyes are red and swollen.
I don't think I know her.
I'd guess she's around the same age as Kanna.
She's been staring at me, her head cocked to the side.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Um...

texts.name: Student
texts.text: Miss Mononouchi Sumomo? That's you, right? The teacher?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: How do you know my full name?!
But after saying that, I realize.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Oh, right, you're in the same class as Kanna?

texts.name: Student
texts.text: Who's Kanna?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Oops, I mean Amei.
She nods.

texts.name: Student
texts.text: You came to stargaze too?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Yep, I did.
She looks back out at the crowd, a lonely smile on her lips.
I watch her for a moment.
Then, all of a sudden, tears well up in her eyes again.
I follow her gaze.
She's staring at a couple holding hands.
They look to be about the same age as Kanna too.
I see. I think I know what's going on here.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Boy trouble?

texts.name: Student
texts.text: Huh?
Turning back to me, she starts to cry in earnest.
Her eyeliner is smudged, making her look like a little like a panda.
She's also used way too much rouge and didn't blend it properly.
She must not be used to wearing makeup.
Maybe she put it on for the first time because she wanted to look pretty for the boy she likes.
Her hair is also in such a state that I'd love to have a word with her hairstylist.
She looks like a pretty ordinary girl.
She must have really mustered up all her courage for this special day.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: It's that guy, right?
My eyes are fixed on the couple.
She nods.

texts.name: Student
texts.text: I wanted to invite him here and tell him how I felt.

texts.name: Student
texts.text: But in the end, I couldn't do it.

texts.name: Student
texts.text: And then, when I saw him here, I thought this was my chance, but...

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Someone else beat you too it? I see.

texts.name: Student
texts.text: My face is a mess now. I want to go home.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: What? But this is a once-in-a-lifetime thing! Are you sure you wanna go back home feeling like this?
Seeing her so devastated...
It reminds me of how miserable I felt every day single day while working here.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Okay, come with me.

texts.name: Student
texts.text: Huh?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Looking like that is just making you more depressed. Come with me and I'll teach you how to do it properly.
As I remove her makeup, including the runny eyeliner, she keeps her eyes closed and begins to tell me about the boy she likes.
Apparently he's in the soccer club, is popular, and really smart.

texts.name: Student
texts.text: He talked to me once, after I read something aloud during Japanese class.

texts.name: Student
texts.text: He told me I had a nice voice, and then...

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: You were head over heels?
Well, she's at the age where girls like the gregarious types.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: But you were thinking about telling him how you feel, right?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: It'd be kinda lame to say it in front of her, but you can still tell him.

texts.name: Student
texts.text: He'd definitely reject me!

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Yeah. You'd be doing it so you could get rejected.

texts.name: Student
texts.text: Why would I do that? That's just weird.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: It's not weird, like, at all!

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: I've had feelings for lots of people, and for each one of them, I've always been happy about being honest with myself.

texts.name: Student
texts.text: Have you ever been rejected?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Hmm... Sorry. Not really.
My response makes her snort with laughter.

texts.name: Student
texts.text: You're supposed to comfort me by talking about your experiences with rejection!

texts.name: Student
texts.text: What advice am I supposed to get from a teacher who's never been dumped?!

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Ahahah! Good point.
A smile starts to spread across her face.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: You know, I think a more natural makeup look would suit you better.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: You don't need to lay the eyeliner on so thick either.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: And you used way too much blusher! You want it to be barely noticeable, like your cheeks are just a little flushed.

texts.name: Student
texts.text: I see!

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: And the biggest problem is this hair. Can I be honest with you? You've really gotta change your stylist. The person doing it either has no skill, or they're not trying. Or both.

texts.name: Student
texts.text: Ahah, that's definitely honest!

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: I can work with it, but my advice is to get yourself to another salon first thing tomorrow. Even tidying it up a little will make a huge difference.
I take some hair wax out of my bag.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: I don't really have a hair iron handy, so it won't hold its shape for long.
I stare at her thick, fluffy bowl cut.
I really wanna do something about this.
I really want to help this girl.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Mind if I trim your bangs?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Look at this! Way cuter, right?! What do you think?!

texts.name: Student
texts.text: I can't believe it! You know so much about this stuff.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: This is pretty much the only thing I'm good at. I can't even write republicaâ€”uh, what was it again?

texts.name: Student
texts.text: Ahahah! Oh, I remember that.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Now you can go right up to that soccer boy and strike up a conversation.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Even when they're with their girlfriends, men never miss a chance to stare at a cutie.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: If you make an impression, you might even be able to turn the tables in your favor.

texts.name: Student
texts.text: ...Yeah, I'll go talk to him. I might as well, since I'm here.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Go for it!

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: I'll be rooting for you. If you get rejected you can bawl your eyes out, then back get up and set your sights on the next guy.

texts.name: Student
texts.text: Thanks, Miss. I wish we could have talked more when you were still a teacher.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Me too. But I'm happy to know you really thought of me as your teacher. Thanks.

texts.name: Student
texts.text: See you later!

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Yep. Be brave, girl!
She sucks in a deep breath before taking a resolute step into the crowd.
I watch her until she's out of sight.
Whoa, this is crazy.
I think this is the most teacher-like thing I've done since I got here.
I truly hope she doesn't have any regrets, even if she gets turned down or if the other girl causes a scene.
After I lose sight of her in the crowd, I go back and sit on my lonely bench.
I look up at the sky just like everyone else.
The comet is so big and bright tonight.
It was Kanna who taught me how beautiful the night sky could be.
I just feel...
So good inside.
I feel kind... cleansed? Like all the grime on my soul's been washed away.
I might really like listening to girls' problems and helping them doll themselves up.
The stars twinkle brightly in the sky.
In the time I've spent with him, I've learned a lot of things from Kanna.
I might remember this summer every time I look up at the night sky.
We head back to the garage before the viewing party is over.
Dad is supposed to join us for dinner and a chat.
I was able to complete the homework Spencer gave me.
I took some pictures I'm pretty happy with, so for now, I'm in a good mood.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Sorry for keeping you waiting.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Don't worry! I had a good time too.
Sumomo is beaming at me.
She seems a lot more peppy now than back when we were at the terminal.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Are you... really leaving today?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Probably, yeah. If it gets too late, I'll check into a hotel near the station.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: ...Right.
Sumomo's smile becomes a wry one.
We continue walking the city road in silence.
Cicadas cry in the distance.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Does your daddy drink?

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Beats me, to be honest. I think he'd have a beer or two with Mom from time to time when she was still around.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Gotcha. So we don't have a second Azuki on our hands.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Don't think we gotta worry about that.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Let's buy some snacks to go with the booze. Let me know if there's anything he can't eat.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: All right. Let's go.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: We're back!

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Oh, took you long enough.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: He took lots of pictures from the roof of the academy.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Did it go well?
I nod.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: There were lots of people there, so I got a ton of good material. I'll pick the best tomorrow and send them to Spencer.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: So we're gonna drink and watch the comet, yeah? Call your pa. We hanging out in here?

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Yeah, gonna do that now. Could you open the shutter?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: I'm so nervous!

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: This was your idea, remember?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: I know!

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Are you sure I should go get him?
Sumomo nods.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Okay. Wait here.
When I enter the living room, I see two boxes of pizza sitting on the table along with some wrapped bowls of salad.
Dad's sitting on the sofa, reading a magazine.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Uh, what's with all this?

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: What kind of a host would I be if I didn't offer refreshments to my guests?

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: I would've helped if you'd asked.

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: But you were out taking pictures, weren't you?

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Yeah, but...

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: Then you wouldn't have had the time, would you?
In his own way, he's supporting my dream.
I realize that now.

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: Are we getting started?
I nod.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: About what we talked yesterday...

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: Listen. If it's what you've decided you want to do, it's fine. I'm sure Anna would be happier too that way.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Yeah. Thanks.

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: There's some drinks in the fridge. Go grab a few cans.
Dad gets up and grabs the pizza boxes.
I follow behind him, loaded down with a bunch of cold shochu highball and beer cans.

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: Good evening.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Ah! Hello!

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Sup.

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: Thank you for inviting me. Kanna filled me in on everything. I, um, brought some pizza.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: What?! S-Sorry, you really didn't have to! But I guess it's good since we only brought a few snacks, even though we were the ones who invited you.

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: Don't worry. I have a lot to thank you two for.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: No, uh, Kanna has done so much for us. We...

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Let's put this stuff down first, my arms are about to drop off.

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: Right. I bought some drinks too, so we can make a toast if you like.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Whoa, thank you! We also bought some stuff. Feel free to help yourself.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Whoa! So much booze!

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Azuki! Let him pick his drink first!

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: I know, geez!
Dad cracks open a beer while Sumomo and Azuki go for the highballs. Then we toast.
After that there's a bit of an awkward silence as everyone struggles to break the ice.

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: Miss Momonouchi...

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Yes!

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: Did you finish your teacher training?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: U-Um, yes. I kind of made it to the last day, yeah...

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: I don't know if I'll become a teacher, though.

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: Is that so?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Yes. Maybe I shouldn't admit this, but I don't think I'm cut out for it.

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: You don't? I heard from Kanna that you've been a very good teacher.

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: As a parent, it would be reassuring to know I'm entrusting my child to someone like you.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: That's... not true. I'm not...

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: I think Sumomo would make a great teacher too.

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: Kanna, you can't call your teacher by her first name.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: No, it's fine! I'm not his teacher anymore.

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: But...

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: I feel more comfortable this way. I don't really like all that formality anyway.

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: I see.
There's silence again.
Azuki lets out a little burp and reaches out for her next can of booze.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Um, so, the first day I came here...

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: Yes?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: We talked then about Kanna and how he wants to become a photographer.
Dad nods.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: How do you feel about it now?

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: Not too different, to be honest. I still want Kanna to at least attend college.

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: But that doesn't mean I don't acknowledge my son's dream.

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: If he's really talented, people will recognize it and opportunities will come. If he starts receiving more job offers than he can balance with his studies, then he can consider going full time with it.

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: But he's not at that point yet.

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: I spoke to a friend of mine that's a professional in the field and he says he sees talent in him, but as his father, I still worry.
He smiles weakly.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Oy, Candy.
Suddenly, Azuki joins the conversation, and everyone turns to her.
Her face is as red as an apple.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: I hope you know you're one lucky kid! The only person that could worry this much about your future is your pa! No one else!

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Don't make him worry! What're you so angsty for? You're blessed, man!

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Right, Pa?!

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: Aha, now I've got a powerful advocate.
My dad's smiling at me from ear to ear now.

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: Excuse me, I'm afraid I didn't catch your name?

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Ah, I'm Azuki. Scrap Hunter Azuki.

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: Azuki... The MeTuber Azuki?
Azuki's eyes open wide.
Both she and I stare at my dad in shock.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Huh? What's that?

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: So you became a mechanic after the wave eating started?

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: I used to watch all your car maintenance videos.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: For real?!

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Huh? What are you guys talking about?

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: Before the wave eating happened, there were people who posted videos online about all sorts of things. Azuki used to do that.

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: You were even driving before getting a license back then. That made it to the news.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: That was a HUGE problem for me!

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: Your Jimny had some incredible suspension customization.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Oh, right! That was the first custom I ever did! It was bangin', wasn't it?

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: That Jimny had a hell of a turning radius.
Azuki's eyes sparkle with excitement.
The more they talk about cars, the less I follow.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: So...

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Hm?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: I wasn't expecting these two to hit it off like this.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Me neither.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Um, we were given this at the last place we went camping. We can drink it together.
When Dad and Azuki are done talking about cars, Sumomo takes the opportunity to take the sake out of the fridge and show it to him.

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: Mm... From Fukushima? Whoa, you went all the way up there, Kanna?
I nod.

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: That's pretty far away. You could have camped somewhere closer to the city.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: I was looking for something.

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: Really?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Kanna, are you gonna ask him?

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Yeah. I didn't find it in the end anyway.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: But I'm sure he'll know. Probably.

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: Mm?
I show Dad the sketch.

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: Oh, Anna drew this.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: It's a drawing of Halley's Comet, right?

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: It is.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Mom was always looking forward to the comet, so I think she wanted to take a picture of it in this place.

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: Wait, you don't know where this is?

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Huh?

texts.name: Sumomo&Azuki
texts.text: Huh?

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: Ahahahah!

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: You fixed the car and went all the way to Fukushima for this?

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: What do you mean?

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: These are wisterias.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Wisterias? Like the flower?

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: This looks like what you'd see looking up a wisteria trellis.
I take another look at the sketch.
The stuff surrounding the comet is supposed to be wisteria flowers?

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Does this tree still exist?

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: Yes, in a sense.
Sumomo, Azuki, and I exchange glances.

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: It's right here. That stump over there.
Dad points.
Following his finger, I see... the tree stump table in front of the sofa. The same one we've been using this whole time.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: That? It's here? Right here?!

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: That's right.
Sumomo and Azuki stare at my dad in disbelief before our gazes all slowly converge on the stump we're all sitting around.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: No way...

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: I think I get it now. The pigeons made all the wisterias around here wither and die.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Oh, it's just like the old man said.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: So that means Mom wanted to photograph the comet from here?
An enigmatic smile comes over Dad's face.

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: Wait a minute.

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: Here.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Huh?

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: This was Anna's favorite picture.
He presents me with a photo frame.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: This is...

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Oh, the one you have in the living room! And there's a wisteria in the background!

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: You're right.

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: You took this picture.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: I did?

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: Anna was really happy about it. Said you captured her best smile.

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: She's the one who put it in the living room.
I take another good look at the picture.
Mom's smile really does look radiant in it.

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: She used to say you knew how to bring out someone's best expression.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: She was right!

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: When we bought this house, there was a really impressive wisteria tree by it.

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: It was a huge tree, you can tell from how thick the stump is. But the pests killed it off.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: But...

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Surely there are better locations than this to photograph the comet from?

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: She always said that she wanted to watch the comet with her family. All of us together.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Then why did we go camping so often? She said we were scouting locations.
Dad's mouth twists into a wry smile.

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: I think that was just an excuse to go camping. Whenever we had a little fight, neither of us would want to back down and apologize, and she always ended up taking us camping instead.

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: She was a stubborn one, and so was I.

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: Apparently, you are too.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Ahahah! You can say that again.

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: Anna drew that picture when the wisteria began to die. Maybe she would have taken the picture from here if it was still blooming today.

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: But wisteria flowers are already fading by July. You can't get this kind of view after May. This is more like Anna's dream scene, I'd say.
The place I was looking for was right in front of me.
It's like a twist out of a fairy tale.
But there's no more wisteria here.
The year I took this picture...
It seems like that was the last year the wisteria bloomed at all.
I can feel the faint tension that's consumed me since Mom's death start to to fade.
I can just imagine Mom laughing her ass off as I run around like a headless chicken.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: It's a little anti-climactic, but I guess it's better than just leaving it as a mystery, right?

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Yeah. Honestly, it feels a little like Mom was messing with me.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Remember what you said back in Fukushima. It's about the journey, not just the destination.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: I agree with that.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Plus, it got you out of your funk and on the path to becoming a professional photographer.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Yeah, it did.

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: And you were doomed to failure the moment you decided to go up against Anna.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: This whole ordeal has helped you grow up, Kanna.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: I hope that's true.
Dad smiles fondly at me then looks at his wristwatch.

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: It's pretty late. Did you two intend to leave today?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Oh, yes. That's the plan.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: But it's gotten pretty late...

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: And Azuki's pretty drunk...

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Eh?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Yeah, so? Uh, why does that matter?
I look up at Dad.
He gives me a little nod.
I return it with one of my own and turn to Azuki.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: The car. I was thinking of giving it to Azuki.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Eh? Why would you do that? Ain't that car important to you?

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Yeah, but I probably won't be able to repair it down the line like Mom and you would.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: I think Hachimaru would be way happier going all over the place with you rather than just gathering dust here.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: And...

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: ...I did smash your bike and burn down your house.
I whisper that last part to her.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Err, I really don't think I can accept it. I mean, it's important to both of you, isn't it?

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: Please, take it, if you want it. The car won't do any good just sitting around here.
Azuki looks to me, then to Dad, and then to Hachimaru.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: The Hachimaru... You're giving it to ME?

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Are you guys sure?

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: As Kanna said, it was just gathering dust until you two arrived. It probably won't see much use out of us. Feel free to take it.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: I can drive Amei Anna's Hachimaru? Man, that's like a dream come true!

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Just don't sell it off, okay?

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Like I ever could! Rest easy! I'll drive it until my hands fall off.

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: Feel free to stay the night too. We're not in a hurry to see you off.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Yeah.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Then I guess we leave tomorrow morning.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Yeah. Can't drive with so many drinks in me.

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: Have a nice night, all of you. I'll head back to the house. Let me know when you leave tomorrow.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Oh, you're going back already?

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: Yes.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: I'll stay a little longer. If that's okay?

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: No drinking, understand?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: I'll watch him!

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Me too!
Dad smiles at them.

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: I'm counting on you two.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: So it was here all along, huh? Who would've guessed?

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: This stump won't be blooming anytime soon, though.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Anyway, what was that whole MeTuber thing about? You haven't always been a scrap hunter?

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: I started doing that after the wave eating. Before that I made my living creating videos that lots of people watched.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: How did you make a living at that?

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Because lots of people watched me, that's how. At least one million people.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: A million?! Are you kidding me?

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: It's the truth, cross my heart. Little Azuki's channel was pretty popular back in the day.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Then why did you become a scrap hunter? Couldn't you have kept doing that?

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Because of the wave eating, remember?

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: People happily watched our videos when they were free, but then the wave eating started and most of us weren't actually good enough at anything for people to want to pay us for it.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: I had some knowledge about vehicles, so I switched to this scrap hunter gig, but there were lots of people who couldn't get a job anywhere.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Whoa, those radio waves sure were convenient.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: That they were. People could just call you up for car repairs anytime too.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: By the way, how is it that your videos got a hundred million people watching them?

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Who knows? Maybe my sparkling personality hooked them?
Sumomo stares intently at her.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: What?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: ...So that's it.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: What the hell do you want?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: There's one thing that's been bothering me this whole time.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Huh?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Azuki... Lemme trim that mane of hair you've got going on.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: This sure brings back memories.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Right? Heheh. It's just like when I cut your hair that first day, isn't it?

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: You're as weird as they come. I mean, suddenly wanting to cut my hair out of nowhere? Didn't see that one coming.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: It is kinda weird, isn't it? I didn't realize it before, but I actually really like prettying people up like this.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Man, I can't believe I had a diamond in the rough right here.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Unwashed for days on end, hair a messâ€”letting all your natural resources go to waste.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Say what?!

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Ahaha! I'll get you back to the Azuki who brought in millions of views.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Ta-da!

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Oooh...

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: She looks like a model. So this is what was hiding underneath all that grime.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: A beauty with no parallel, aren't I?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Oh no, now she's getting cocky.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: I'm gonna cock my fist into your face!

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Why don't you try making it as a model? I can ask Spencer to do a shoot for you.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: What? Nah, I'll pass. I'm a mere scrap hunter. I can't go around stealing people's hearts.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Let me translate that for you. She's really into the idea.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: No I'm not!

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Look this way, I wanna take some photos.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Ah, that's not fair! I wanna get my picture taken too!

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Come on, Peach, don't get jealous now. This is just his job. It's a business relationship, that's all.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Ahahah! Suddenly you're a pro? It didn't take much for you to get on board, huh?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Kanna's gonna make you soft if you're not careful.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Am not!
After I take some photos of Azuki with her new haircut, we go and sit at the table again.
The stump table we always gathered around now has a whole new meaning.
The night marches on.
It's our last night all together.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: I dwank too mush...

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Uhhh, are you okay?! You've gotta drive tomorrow! I won't have you killing me in a crash!

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: It's fine, don't you worry. I'll be in top shape come tomorrow. I don't even know what a hangover is...
As she speaks, Azuki plops down onto the sofa like a sack of potatoes.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Looks like we'll be leaving late in the day.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Seems so.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Well, guess it's time for me to hit the hay too.
Sumomo throws her arms up and stretches.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Yeah.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Are you gonna sleep in your room?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: ...Wanna sleep in the car with me?

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: ...Yeah.
I murmur my response, and Sumomo smiles at me.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: It's our last night... We can spend it together.
Sumomo takes my hand.
I look up at her.
She's still smiling, a slight rosy blush staining her cheeks.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: It's been super fun, hasn't it?

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Yeah.
We're lying down facing each other in the small bed inside Hachimaru.
Our faces are really close.
And our feet are touching.
No matter the position, some part of our bodies comes together, which means I feel Sumomo's warmth on my skin.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: ...Kanna.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Mm?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Did you make good memories this summer?
When I nod, she smiles sweetly.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Will you remember me?

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: ...Yeah.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Me too.
She puts her hand over mine again.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: I'm so glad I came to see you that day.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: I'm proud of myself for giving teaching a shot, since it led me to you.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Yeah...

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: This really is the last night, huh?
I simply nod.
Whenever she talks, her sweet breath tickles my nose.
Along with the scent of peaches from her hair.
If I'm not careful with my arms, I'm sure I'll end up touching her chest.
Unable to move, I simply stare at Sumomo.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: I wish we could just go to bed like this.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Mhm.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Truth is I want to do a lot of other things. Right now.
She flashes me a meaningful smile.
I simply stare at it, too stunned to speak.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: But your daddy left you in my care, so we probably shouldn't.
She gives me a slightly pained smile.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: I'll wake up early and go back to my room before he notices.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Ahah! Really?
I nod.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Can you hold yourself back? We really shouldn't do anything tonight.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: ...I can.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: You had to think about it, didn't you?

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: I'll wait until we can be a proper couple. You know I will.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Mhm, that's my boy.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: That's what I love about you.
I silently stare at her hand, holding mine.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: We should get some rest.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Sleep tight.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Let's meet again, no matter what. And then... we can pick up where we left off.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: ...Yeah.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: I'll be waiting for you. I'll fight the aging process and wait for you.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: You're the prettiest woman in the world. You'll be fine.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Thanks. I'll do my best so you can still say that, no matter how many years go by.
I fall asleep in Sumomo's arms.
That night, I have a dream.
In the dream, I'm a crybaby boy.
My car's broken and I can't fix it. I've been crying my eyes out.
But then...
A white-haired girl gently kisses my forehead.
I raise my head and see her bashful smile.
Looking up at her, I realize that I'm in love.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Kanna?

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Yeah?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Did you wake up?

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: I think I had a dream.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Mhm...

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: There was a girl with hair like yours...

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: We were walking through a cornfield, and then...

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: The boy was crying, so the girl kisses him, right?
I raise my head.
Sumomo blinks slowly, like her eyelids are really heavy.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: How did you know?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: I had the same dream.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Is that even possible?
She slowly shakes her head.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: It's never happened to me before, at least.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Me either.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Eheheh, I'm happy that my first time was with you.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Let's go back to sleep. Then sun's not up yet.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Okay.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Good night.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Night.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: That everything, Peach?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Yeah! All in!

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: So I gotta drive you to Tokyo, right?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Pretty please!
In the afternoon, when Azuki's hangover has subsided, the girls gather their luggage and load it up into Hachimaru.
Hachimaru's engine rumbles to life.
Then, it slowly pulls out of the garage.
Dad and I stand side by side, watching Hachimaru leave.
They come to a stop in the middle of the yard, and Sumomo gets out of the car and comes up to us.
The sunset tinges Sumomo's fair skin a shade of red.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: We'll be going now.

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: You're welcome to come by again whenever you like.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Thank you. Next time I'll come and say hi before crashing on your couch.
The comment gets a chuckle from Dad.
I step forward to stand in front of her.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: ...Sumomo.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Yeah?

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: I love you.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: I'm so glad we met. And I'm grateful to you for dragging me back to the academy.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Mm.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: I wish you could stay with me forever.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: I'm afraid I might lose my way again on my own.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: I want you by my side.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Thank you, Kanna.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: That makes me so happyâ€”it really does. But this is a very important time for you, and I can't bear to get in the way of that.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: You wouldn't be in my way.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Besides, I'm also thinking about going back to college.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: This time, I'll study what I really want to do.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: I'm going to do my best to become someone just as accomplished as I know you'll be.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: You know, we're both still kind of kids right now.
With my head hanging down, I can feel the tears welling up in my eyes.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Someday, when we're both properly grown up...

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Tell me how you feel then.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: I'll be waiting. I'll wait for as long as it takes for you to become a super cool photographer.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: So...

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Let's both do our very best.
All I can do is nod.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: ...Okay.
I manage to squeeze out that quavering word.
My vision is blurry with tears.
I can't even see my feet anymore.
But then...
This time, I understand right away.
The soft feeling on my forehead is Sumomo's lips.
Just like that night in the forest.
Sumomo's gentle kiss gives me courage.
Her breath stirs my bangs.
It feels like her warmth is flowing right into me from her lips.
And then, she slowly pulls her lips away.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Bye, Kanna. We'll definitely see each other again.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: ...Yeah.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: I'll be waiting for you, okay?

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: ...Okay.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: I'm going now.
I just nod.
I hear her footsteps recede.
At the same time, I can hear Dad walk up behind me.

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: Don't look down, Kanna.

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: You're gonna go get her someday, right? If so, then you need to see her off now.
He places one hand on my shoulder.

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: You're a man now, aren't you?

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: ...Yeah.
I raise my face.
Sumomo is in the passenger seat now.
She's looking at me with a smile on her face and tears in her eyes.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: I'll come find you, Sumomo.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Yeah!

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Wait for me.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: I will! I can't wait!
I force myself to smile as I wave goodbye.
Just like her, with tears in my eyes.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: You take care too, Azuki!

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: You too, Candy. It was a good time.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: It was for me too.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: You ready, Peach?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Yes.
Azuki revs up Hachimaru's diesel engine.
The car rolls forward, crunching on the gravel in front of the garage.
Dad and I watch my two precious friends set off on their journey with Mom's Hachimaru.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Ngh... *Sniff*
I start to weep, my dad still holding my shoulder.
His hand never wavers. He holds me close and reassures me.

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: Crying is nothing to be ashamed of.

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: It sounds like you had a really good summer.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Mhm.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: ...I'll go to the academy like I should.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: I'll see if I can study something that'll help with my photography even as an undergrad.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: I want to become a man worthy of Sumomo.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: So I'll do my best to become that person.

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: I'm sure you will.

texts.name: Dad
texts.text: In fact, I know you will.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: Thanks, Dad.

texts.name: Kanna
texts.text: I'm sorry for causing you so much worry.
He doesn't answer. Instead, he grips my shoulder with quiet strength.
That's enough to convey his feelings to me.
Looking out at the scenery as it flows by, memories of summer replay in my mind.
I wonder if I've ever had as much fun as I did these past few weeks.
Probably not.
I've probably never felt this lonely before either.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: It was so much fun.
The evening breeze of summer carries my tears away.
I'm so sad I can't help but cry, and so happy I can't help but smile.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: You sure about leaving?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Hm?

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: You're still on summer break, right?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Yeah, but I think I have to move forward too.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Forward?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Forward, yeah.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: I mean, you saw how much he grew up in such a short time. He'll be disappointed if I just stay the same.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: He'll start thinking I'm not as awesome as he thought.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: You think so? I think you're pretty funny as you are.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: I'm not looking to just be funny! I'm gonna become a proper lady that can make Kanna's jaw drop to the floor!

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Gotcha.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Haah... It's been a lifetime since I fell in love like this.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Youth sure is nice.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: No joke... Hah, even I'm laughing at how silly I am.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: But... I never thought I'd ever fall for someone so completely.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: I think I like it.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: That so?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: I kept it platonic in the end! Good job, me!

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: Huh, so you didn't do the dirty after all?

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: Yeah, figured I'd delay gratification for once.

texts.name: Azuki
texts.text: ...You truly are the bitchy peach.

texts.name: Sumomo
texts.text: I'll be waiting for you, Kanna.
